Name: STIX: Combat Devolved
About the game: WELCOME TO MAYHEM! Try our signature mode that cycles through 3 phases: Buy Phase: Earn Benjamins by slaughtering your enemies (and probably friends) to upgrade your equipment and gain abilities to compliment your play style. Event Phase: Participate in various game modes such as Zombie Invasion, Team Deathmatch, King of the Hill, and more! Free-For-All: Coming out of the event phase it's every stick for themselves! You may be forced to turn on your old teammates to get the dub! SLAM ENERGY DRINKS! Use energy to turn your weapons up a notch, unlocking powerful special abilities unique to each weapon! Use weapons together to create insane combos to obliterate your enemies!
